textBox.richText: “Hello my dragons... We are currently in the lead for the house cup, it is a slim lead but we are ahead. OH MY GOOOOOOODDDDDNEEEESSS RIGHT?! WE GOTTA KEEP THIS LEAD!!!! Okay I want everyone in the stands tomorrow cheering and don’t walk away from our stands because we will hunt you down and drag you back into the stand where you belong. To the competitors tomorrow, GOOD LUCK! I BELIEVE IN ALL OF YOU!!! Okay so the new chant is this, PLEASE MAKE SURE YOU KNOW IT FOR TOMORROW! Sink or swim, Do or die, Now’s the time to watch us fly. Watch us soar, Hear us roar, We are Dragons and we’ll beat them all! GOOOOOOO DRAGGOOOONNNNN” -Mervyn McKinley, Head of House
